https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jo3et8dMhv3MIxxpRGPDWEMbKO.jpg A biographical TV movie about Soviet leader Leonid Brezhnev that originally aired in four parts on Russia's Channel One. While nostalgic, the film does not attempt to rehabilitate Brezhnev. Brezhnev
